    • protocol

      public <NEWBUF extends FriendlyByteBuf, NEWBASE extends CustomPacketPayload> PayloadProtocol<NEWBUF,NEWBASE> protocol(NetworkProtocol<NEWBUF> protocol)
      Description copied from interface: PayloadConnection
      Creates a builder grouping together all packets under the same protocol. This will validate that the protocol matches before the packet is sent or received.
